name: Nightwalk (itch)
description:
Nightwalk

Go on a quiet night adventure to find a very special someone. Where could they have gone?

Switch between human and ghost forms to navigate and explore the environment. Delve into graves to speak with the deceased. Reflect during a silent journey in the night.

A game originally created for GBJAM5 (October 2016). An updated version of the game is also available: complete with audio, gamepad support, and minor bug fixes.

Keyboard Controls

Arrow Keys — move

Spacebar — jump / select

Shift — transform

Enter Door — up arrow key (as human)

Enter Grave — down arrow key (as ghost)

Escape — quit game

f4 — toggle fullscreen

Gamepad Controls

Left Stick / D-Pad — move

A — jump / select

B — transform

Enter door — up (as human)

Enter grave — down (as ghost)
